# Library (Presets) {#library}

If you want to [configure your own style](styles.md#configure-your-own-style), those are the some styles you can reuse.

Many [TOML](#toml) configs below are used in the [default style file](https://github.com/andreoliwa/nitpick/blob/master/nitpick-style.toml).

You can use these examples directly with their `py://` URL (see [multiple styles](configuration.md#multiple_styles)), or copy/paste the TOML into your own style file.

<!-- auto-generated-start-style-library -->

## any

| Style URL                                                                                                          | Description                                                                                    |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [py://nitpick/resources/any/codeclimate]({{ github_url('src/nitpick/resources/any/codeclimate.toml') }})           | [CodeClimate](https://codeclimate.com/)                                                        |
| [py://nitpick/resources/any/commitizen]({{ github_url('src/nitpick/resources/any/commitizen.toml') }})             | [Commitizen (Python)](https://github.com/commitizen-tools/commitizen)                          |
| [py://nitpick/resources/any/commitlint]({{ github_url('src/nitpick/resources/any/commitlint.toml') }})             | [commitlint](https://github.com/conventional-changelog/commitlint)                             |
| [py://nitpick/resources/any/editorconfig]({{ github_url('src/nitpick/resources/any/editorconfig.toml') }})         | [EditorConfig](https://editorconfig.org/)                                                      |
| [py://nitpick/resources/any/git-legal]({{ github_url('src/nitpick/resources/any/git-legal.toml') }})               | [Git.legal - CodeClimate Community Edition](https://github.com/kmewhort/git.legal-codeclimate) |
| [py://nitpick/resources/any/pre-commit-hooks]({{ github_url('src/nitpick/resources/any/pre-commit-hooks.toml') }}) | [pre-commit hooks for any project](https://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-hooks)             |
| [py://nitpick/resources/any/prettier]({{ github_url('src/nitpick/resources/any/prettier.toml') }})                 | [Prettier](https://github.com/prettier/prettier)                                               |
